problem_statement: List | pause | paragraph combo removes needed line break
pull_message:
Don't remove newlines after every list + pause
This makes it so that a list + pause combo doesn't always pop the newline as this only should be the behavior if the thing right after is a list.

Fixes #32.
setup_command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Setup script for the presenterm repository.
# Installs tools required to run tests and generate a JUnit XML report.

# Ensure cargo is available (rust toolchain). If not, try to install via rustup.
if ! command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "cargo not found. Installing rustup..."
    # Non-interactive rustup installation
    curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y
    # shellcheck source=/dev/null
    source "$HOME/.cargo/env"
fi
